response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value, we believe it's worth $15,000 to you. However, I understand that negotiations are key in such transactions. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $14,000. This offer includes all the benefits and features that make this product invaluable to you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 14000}
